decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2015 22 20, 2015 22 22 - Received 20 May 2015  Flood Risk Assessment received 22/7/15 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The lower ground floor of the property shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 4 Ibis Lane
Condition : 5 - No development shall take place until the full details of the safety balustrade have been submitted to, and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Proposed conversion of lower ground floor accomodation to form home office and garden room, and external lightwell to rear garden.
